Title: Requires that employees laid off due to the COVID-19 state disaster emergency retain their salary, seniority and benefits once rehired
Summary: Requires that employees laid off due to the COVID-19 state disaster emergency retain their salary, seniority and benefits once rehired.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring that employees laid off due to the COVID-19 state disaster emergency retain their salary, seniority and benefits once rehired
